FuncDef: The display mld statistics command displays statistics about MLD messages on BAS interfaces.
CLIs: display mld statistics { user-id <user-id> | all | all-user }

ParaDef.Info:
Displays statistics about MLD messages with a specified user ID on BAS interfaces.
user-id specifies the ID of a user.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 4294967295.

Displays global statistics about MLD messages of all users on BAS interfaces.
-

Displays statistics about MLD messages of each user on BAS interfaces respectively.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display mld statistics user-id 65
The data of user-id 65 MLD statistics:
Received successful V1 report packets number                : 181
Received unsuccessful V1 report packets number              : 0
Received V1 done packets number                             : 0
Received successful V2 report packets number                : 0
Received unsuccessful V2 report packets number              : 0
Sent query packets number                                   : 179
Received invalid MLD packets                                : 0
<HUAWEI> display mld statistics all
The data of MLD statistics of all users:
Received successful V1 report packets number                : 188
Received unsuccessful V1 report packets number              : 0
Received V1 done packets number                             : 0
Received successful V2 report packets number                : 0
Received unsuccessful V2 report packets number              : 0
Sent query packets number                                   : 182
Received invalid MLD packets                                : 0
<HUAWEI> display mld statistics all-user
The data of user-id 65 MLD statistics:
Received successful V1 report packets number                : 181
Received unsuccessful V1 report packets number              : 0
Received V1 done packets number                             : 0
Received successful V2 report packets number                : 0
Received unsuccessful V2 report packets number              : 0
Sent query packets number                                   : 179
Received invalid MLD packets                                : 0
ExtraInfo: To check statistics about MLD messages on BAS interfaces, run the display mld statistics command. The command output includes MLDv1 messages, MLDv2 messages, sent MLD Query messages and received MLD Done messages on BAS interfaces. The command output helps you troubleshoot faults when users fail to receive multicast traffic.
